title: Ellis Island Part of Statue of Liberty National Monument: Contact Public Affairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Contact Public Affairs              Contact Public Affairs         The Ellis Island Museum of Immigration features the historic Registry Room. Also known as the Great Hall, this is where immigrants were processed when the building was an immigration station a century ago. NPS Photo  Statue of Liberty National Monument, which includes Ellis Island as well as Liberty Island, is a national park in New York Harbor. The park's Public Affairs Office is responsible for media affairs on both islands. For information on news stories regarding the park: Email us Phone: 646-356-2105 Mailing Address: Statue of Liberty National Monument c/o Public Affairs Office New York, New York 10004
